statements.english: you need to make a promise

you need to keep the promise

statements.english: I don't want you to make a promise

statements.chinese: 我不想要你做一个你不能遵守的承诺
statements.english: I don't want you to make a promise you can't keep

statements.chinese: 当你（现在）正在钓鱼的时候
你必须保持安静当你（现在）正在钓鱼的时候
statements.english: you have to keep quiet when you are fishing

statements.chinese: 你必须保守我们的秘密
statements.english: you have to keep our secret

statements.chinese: 她不可以保守一个秘密
她不可以保守一个秘密五分钟
statements.english: she can't keep a secret for five minutes

statements.chinese: 她（过去）说她不可以保守一个秘密五分钟
statements.english: she said she can't keep a secret for five minutes

statements.chinese: 在工作和生活之间保持一个好的平衡
statements.english: to keep a good balance between work and life

statements.english: you have to keep a good balance between work and life

statements.chinese: 在工作和生活之间保持一个好的平衡
statements.english: to keep a good balance between work and life

statements.chinese: 在工作和生活之间保持一个好的平衡（它）是非常困难的
statements.english: it is very difficult to keep a good balance between work and life

statements.chinese: 我（过去）告诉你对于那件事保持沉默
statements.english: I told you to keep quiet about it

statements.english: to keep quiet about my plan

statements.english: you promised to keep quiet about my plan
I want you to promise me
you will not tell him the truth
